documentation.text:
@dev
Add new customer to contract. Adds customer to mappings, generates new 
agreementId. Triggers deposit of funds to Aave pool to begin accruing yield. Adds value to
cumulative deposits.
Requires remote sensing scripts to have been run to estabish baseline data at API endpoints
Requires donor to approve dai transfer before function is called:
dai.approve(contract,200e18,{'from':donor})
Approving _value only (rather than unlimited approval) protects against any re-entrancy attack.
Removed onlyOwner modifier so anyone can add an agreement if paid for by a donor. Requires
donor to have approved a DAI transfer of value >= _value.

@dev
internal func called by addNewCustomer()
sends all dai in contract to Aave lending pool,
returning aDai

@dev
returns accumulated aDai to Aave pool, retrieving Dai at 1:1

@dev 
internal, called by setBaseLine() and UpdateOracleData()
sets weighting for aggregating the oracle data
default is to trust all oracles equally (100,100,100)

@dev
assumes remote sensing scripts have been run setting baseline data at the API endpoints

@dev
assumes remote sensing scripts have been run a second time, updating the API endpoints

@dev
settles the agreement for a given customer by checking the
agreed value and paying it to the customer's wallet if the
updated values exceeds the baseline. Otherwise, return to donor.

@dev
withdraws enough dai from Aave pool to equal the total
accumulated profit and transfers it to the owners wallet
always persists enough adai in contract to payout all
active agreements

@dev
release any spare LINK to the contract owner

documentation.text:
@dev
This function calls the oracles by building the request then calling the internal
fulfill() function. 
Each fulfill adds new data to the oracleData[] array and increments the index.

UpdateOracleData(address,uint16,uint16,u.details: assumes remote sensing scripts have been run a second time, updating the API endpoints

WithdrawFundsFromAave(uint256).details: returns accumulated aDai to Aave pool, retrieving Dai at 1:1

addNewCustomer(address,address,uint256).details: Add new customer to contract. Adds customer to mappings, generates new  agreementId. Triggers deposit of funds to Aave pool to begin accruing yield. Adds value to cumulative deposits. Requires remote sensing scripts to have been run to estabish baseline data at API endpoints Requires donor to approve dai transfer before function is called: dai.approve(contract,200e18,{'from':donor}) Approving _value only (rather than unlimited approval) protects against any re-entrancy attack. Removed onlyOwner modifier so anyone can add an agreement if paid for by a donor. Requires donor to have approved a DAI transfer of value >= _value.

retrieveLINK().details: release any spare LINK to the contract owner

setBaseLine(address,uint16,uint16,uint16.details: assumes remote sensing scripts have been run setting baseline data at the API endpoints

settleAgreement(address).details: settles the agreement for a given customer by checking the agreed value and paying it to the customer's wallet if the updated values exceeds the baseline. Otherwise, return to donor.

takeProfits().details: withdraws enough dai from Aave pool to equal the total accumulated profit and transfers it to the owners wallet always persists enough adai in contract to payout all active agreements
